This is one of the best games I've played in a while. The storyline is fantastic, the game is not technically impressive but artistically amazing, the characters are eccentric and hilarious and the puzzles are incredibly enjoyable to solve. An absolute must-have.

This is without a doubt the best game I've ever played.
Unlike the previous game which was more like a tech demo rather than a game, this offers a solid story and fun gameplay.
Просто великолепная игра!

Portal 2... the game people have been demanding since the world was lit with light. The masterpiece that fills your eyes with tears of joy... that cake.... It's undeniably a game you would want to grasp as soon as possible; embrace the companion cube, learn the truth about cake... umm... friendship. If one portal wasn't enough, then two is more than you could ever imagine. You won't be needing anything else! Take 2 pay for 1, they come in two colors, have a nice day! But that's not it! If you order as we speak, you'll get a free potato and a lemon! Hold your horses... let's double that offer! You will now get two potatoes and two lemons! You must think we just cloned that deal using a cloning machine, but fear not... we keep our minds inside the safe zone at all times.

As the boss says: "When you give up, that's when you truly *bleep* up." Reach beyond your imagination, befriend the repair robot, color everything with experimental gels, reveal the lie as it unfolds itself.... Get it now!

[Rejected sale attempt #108 - Aperture Science]

A very clever game. If your into solving problems, you should get this.
9/10

Il primo portal fu una trovata francamente geniale. Portal 2 è una rivoluzione, un piccolo gioello, il capolavoro della Valve (si, facciamo finta per un attimo che HL non esista). La giovane ed ostinata Chell viene risvegliata anni dopo il primo Portal, la Aperture Science è andata in rovina e la malvagia GlaDos giace dove l'avevamo lasciata... Cosa potrebbe andare storto?

L'atmosfera, la giocabilità, e i dettagli sono il punto cruciale di questo puzzle game che vi terrà ORE incollati davanti al monitor. Se costasse 50 € li varrebbe tutti, ma fortunatamente questo gioco costa molto di meno, quindi, cosa aspettate?

[h1]9 / 10[/h1] Pony farm confirmed.

A masterpiece of work! Sweet story, less of a challange and surprisingly funny! Well made.

Portal rip-off -_-

Portal 2 est l'un de ces jeux qui ne peut que plaire par son concept. Le démarrage a tendance à être un peu délicat si l'on n'a pas joué au premier opus étant donné que l'on doit "apprendre" tous les concepts du jeu. Un fois ce derniers maîtrisés, cela devient un vrai plaisir ! Le scénario et tout bonnement excellent et le mode coopératif ajoute également une bonne intéraction en permettant de parler avec son partenaire par l'intermédiaire du mode de conversation audio intégré au jeu.
This is a great game if you enjoy puzzles. I got confused a few times myself.
This game will destory your brain, but in a good way.

The king of all Puzzle Games and the only game that made me "WOW" the whole walkthrough. I hate most single player games because I don't like to play by the rules the game sets, but this game, although not giving you the choice to change how the story progresses, it gives you a jaw breaking experience of the story and an amazing flow of gameplay that makes you want MORE. 10/10 (Yes the game is old, but the community made enough chambers that will keep you baffled all the time, buy it and give it a try, you will be amazed)
9 из 10

You need two portals to be useful anyway. One just isn't enough.
10/10

The sequels are always dissapointing right? Not in Valve's situation. Even though the puzzles are easier that the first one, the depth of the game, story, Wheatley and score makes at another unique experience. I love you Valve.

Amazing, simply amazing. Valve may struggle with the number 3, but they sure know how to tango! The Story, Characters, Music, Puzzle Solving, and Game Play melt into one of the most emotionally engaging games I've ever played. The ending is stellar and the Co-Op adds even more depth to the puzzle solving.

Хотите головолмку, тогда эта игра для вас. Возможность линейного сюжета и совместной игры с другом. Встроенный стритель новых карт. Улучшение роботов и многое другое. Это продолжение одноимённой игры с улучшенной графикой.
This is one of the best game ever!! The story is awesome, you must play the first one for better experience. And the co-op add tons of fun!!

Never have I loved to hate a character. And yet, never have I hated the fact that I ended up loving her. I am speaking about GLaDOS if you hadn't figured that out. From her trying to kill me to eventually saving me. The humour in this game is amazing and will keep you in stitches the entire story line. 

From potatoes to lemons, everything is made out to be funny, even serious brain damage. 

I don't know why it took me so long to get around to playing this game, but it is totally worth it. But seriously, WHERE IS MY HALF-LIFE: EPISODE 3?
Its more portal, but even prettier! Need I say more?

I'm not a huge fan of puzzle games but this takes the cake. Haha. Anyway, Its a challenging game that still remains fun and not frustrating. I havent played the multiplayer, but I hear its good. The thing that amazed me the most is that the story is really good. Its a interesting and very good take on the modern puzzle game. Valve can do no wrong.

I honestly can't believe I haven't gotten around to recommending this game until now.

A leap far beyond the first installment and a foot in the door of Half-Life territory, Portal 2 opens big and never stops expanding. 

Not merely just a maze of puzzles, this Valve epic really comes into its own over the course of 10-12 top notch comedic story-telling hours. I swear I laughed almost my entire time playing, if not with at least a smile on my face as I wormed my way through the wonderfully diverse obstacles.

This is all not to mention the thrilling and often times more frustrating Co-Operative mode which, plain and simple, can make or break a gaming friendship. Voice communication (NOT) optional. 

Do not hesitate to buy come rainy day or killer Steam sale.
